channel.title: Pages on Manas Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Manas Gupta

item.title: about
item.description: My name is Manas Gupta. I am a Production Engineer at Facebook. Past jobs include - Yahoo!, Easilydo, Nuance. When I am not spending time with my wife and two wonderful daughters, you can find me reading plot summaries for movies/tv-shows. I do read technical books without waiting for the spoilers. I have lived in a lot of places, but Montreal (Canada) can be considered home base. Need to reach me?
